get.summary: Refresh (get) channel data by id; user must be admin of the channel

patch.summary: Update deal draft (type, duration, price, details). Clears both signatures.

get.summary: List deal messages (chat invite + replies) for the deal in chronological order. Caller must be lessor or lessee.

post.summary: Send deal chat invite message to the current user. Sends "Reply to this message to chat with the other side." and stores the message for reply tracking.
Sign deal (lessor or lessee). When both have signed same terms, status becomes approved.

get.summary: List all listings with optional type filter (public, no auth)
List channels where current user is admin
List current user's listings with optional type filter
